testcase.name: getresponse

error.message: Failed to obtain JDBC Connection; nested exception is com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerException: The TCP/IP connection to the host BMT-LAP-88SQLEXPRESS, port 1433 has failed. Error: "BMT-LAP-88SQLEXPRESS. Verify the connection properties. Make sure that an instance of SQL Server is running on the host and accepting TCP/IP connections at the port. Make sure that TCP connections to the port are not blocked by a firewall.".
